Title: Completely smash the rightist deviation of reversing verdicts
Designer: Preparatory Office for the founding and celebration of the Sichuan Provincial Revolutionary Committee (四川省革命委员会成立和庆祝大会筹备办公室)United Revolutionary Rebel Committee of the Sichuan Provincial Art Circles (四川省文艺界革命造反联合委员会)Editorial Office of the New Art Commune "Red Wave" (新美术公社“红涛”编辑部)
Publisher: Sichuan Dongfanghong chubanshe (四川东方红出版社)
Notes: A worker, a soldier and a representative of the "poor and lower middle peasants" threaten caricatures of Deng Xiaoping, Liu Shaoqi and a third person we have not identified.
